comments: Number of lattice paths from (0,0) to (n,n) with steps E=(1,0) and N=(0,1) which touch or cross the line x-y=6. - _Herbert Kociemba_, May 24 2004
references: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards Applied Math. Series 55, 1964 (and various reprintings), p. 828.
links: M. Abramowitz and I. A. Stegun, eds., Handbook of Mathematical Functions, National Bureau of Standards, Applied Math. Series 55, Tenth Printing, 1972 [alternative scanned copy].
M. Janjic and B. Petkovic, A Counting Function, arXiv preprint arXiv:1301.4550, 2013. - From N. J. A. Sloane, Feb 13 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
